text:
Question 166) The Sol Magnetic Activity Cycle has a period of 11 years. The beginning of the first registered cycle was in early 1755 and extended until the end of 1765. Since then, all cycles of magnetic activity of the sun have been recorded.
In the year 2101, the sun will be in the magnetic activity cycle
A) 32.
B) 34.
C) 33.
D) 35.
E) 31.
